channel.title: Can't open clients!

item.title: Can't open clients!
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

STFU

You need to open batch files with cmd.exe, not notepad.exe. You can change the default opening by right clicking on the file and selecting Open With… then select C:\WINDOWS\system32\cmd.exe and select the box that says use this program for all files like this.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't open clients!
item.dc:creator: @dragon_burst dragon burst
item.description:
@dragon_burst wrote:

if i click the
client with glu.bat this come

@echo off
COLOR 09
title DeathMoon
@echo DeathMoon Client
@echo -----------------------
java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32
pause

and if i click complie.bat this comes

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

but i have java !!! :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:[flash=200,200][flash=200,200][flash=200,200][b][i][u][s][shadow=red,left][/shadow][/s][/u][/i][/b][/flash][/flash][/flash][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2009, 08:52:37 am[/size][hr]fast help me
